主动吸烟或暴露于环境烟草烟雾与所有中风以及主要病理和病因亚型的风险增加相关研究人员评估了烟草使用和接触如何影响中风风险，具体情况因类型、地区和收入水平而异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Active-smoking-or-exposure-to-environmental-tobacco-smoke- Associated-with-increased-risk-for-all-中风-and-major-病理和病因亚型.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Active-smoking-or-exposure-to-environmental-tobacco-smoke- Associated-with-increased-risk-for-all-中风-and-major-病理和病因亚型.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b58f83b1-f615-47b1-b7c0-61227be0df07 Tue, 19 Mar 2024 11:04:00 -0400 Active smoking or exposure to environmental tobacco smoke associated with increased risk for all stroke and major pathological and etiological subtypes
新研究报告称，到 2021 年，全球将有超过 30 亿人患有神经系统疾病研究人员估计了 1990 年至 2021 年间 37 种神经系统疾病及其相关风险因素造成的全球、区域和国家健康损失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/More-than-3-billion-people-worldwide-lived-with-a-neurological-condition-in-2021-new-study-reports.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/More-than-3-billion-people-worldwide-lived-with-a-neurological-condition-in-2021-new-study-reports.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b032afd-72f4-4520-91b9-c79b235221fe Tue, 19 Mar 2024 10:38:00 -0400 More than 3 billion people worldwide lived with a neurological condition in 2021, new study reports
